item.description:
"...WASHINGTON – Today, the Department of Transportation’s Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) reached the decision that 149 federal contract towers will close beginning April 7 as part of the agency’s sequestration implementation plan..."

How about we make the rounds to our local friendly controllers one last time as class Delta airspace.

KFIT - KASH - KLWM - KBVY- KOWD - KORH - KFIT

Total round robin trip is 123nm....

At our first stop we can eat at Sandy's in Nashua, as an alternate for food, there's Joe's Landing at KLWM. (Joe's is a bit smaller though, but take your pick).

While at KASH, let's ask ground for a "Tour of the Tower".

 

KASH

I'd like to do a full stop landing, contact ground, taxi back and go to the next stop. Pick the ones you want or not.

 

 

If you're ambitious, feel free to add our friends in CT at KOXC-KDXR-KBDR-KHVN-KGON-KHFD. another 276 nm RT.

 

 

KBVY

 

 

 

 

 

 

KLWM

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KORH

 

 

 

 

 

 

KOWD
item.how_to_find_us: First stop for eggs and tears at KASH.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Farewell Fly to our local Delta's.
